name: Shard Of The World
description:
Shard  Of The World

Made special for "Jam From the People" (hosted by dtf.ru).

Original Jam page on DTF

All scripts and assets (expect player sprites) made by me during the jam.

ONLY  russian language!

Controls:

AWSD - movement

E - pickup / interact

F - switching beetwen inventory slots

LMB - use active item

Hope you'll enjoy it!
